Title: Sitewide
Notes: Displays published announcements for the set display range if sitewide is checked for announcement. Shows only the text field. Limit to one. Uses urgency as a views row tclass.

Title: By Section
Notes: Displays published announcements for the set display range if the current URL matches the wild card URL set in the by section URL of the announcement. Shows only the text field. Uses urgency as a views row tclass.

Title: All Upcoming Events
Notes: Shows image, node title, date and summary. Exposed filter for keyword, category. Sorted by date (asc)

Title: Events List
Notes: Shows image, node title, date and summary. Relationships from paragraph to category to node to only show events by the category selected on the paragraph. Contextual filter for paragraph id (hidden if blank). Only shows upcoming events. Sorted by date (asc).

Title: By Placement Tag
Notes: Goes on department and college content types and should show the contact and hours teasers tagged with the matching tag.

Title: By Page Family
Notes: Goes at the bottom of general pages - shows contact/hours teasers from fields referenced in page family taxonomy. Pulls in social platforms from page family taxonomy.

Title: By College
Notes: Goes on college nodes under the body field. Shows the department title (linked). Contextual filter for node Id by URL to show all departments related to the college (use relationship from college reference field).

Title: Facts List
Notes: Lists most recent facts with the matching placement tag or page family from the paragraph. Max of 5. Shows teaser. Uses paragraph fields to define the filters.

Title: Most Recent by Tag
Notes: Shows up to the 5 most recently created facts. Filter for placement tag from the department/college/program. Expose items per page to block settings so can alter by content type.

Title: Facts Review
Notes: Admin reporting page used to review facts who's expiration date is past.

Title: Jobs
Notes: Need to define what is displayed and filters. Add search results counter header (see directory).

Title: All Staff
Notes: Shows photo, node title, position. Exposed filter for title, sorted by last name. asc

Title: Profiles List
Notes: Uses paragraph fields to define the filters, pager and sort.

Title: Department Faculty
Notes: Shows random three teasers specific to the department, must have image to appear.

Title: Program Faculty
Notes: Shows random three teasers specific to the program, must have image to appear.

Title: Directory
Notes: Shows all profiles as teaser. Sorted by last name asc. Paged and filtered to match the mockups.

Title: Programs by Department
Notes: Shows a list of majors/minors available in the department. View program link has '+ program node:title' visually hidden for screen reader context. Uses teaser view mode. Image not shown on mobile.

Title: Programs List
Notes: Uses paragraph fields to define the filters, pager and sort.

Title: Program Search
Notes: Build with search api. Keywords search should include: title, department, college, degree type, campus, major/minor, program length, mode of delivery, intro, description, example careers. Need additional custom search block (like global search) for program search paragraph. Multiple program accordions can be open by default. Image not shown at all on mobile.  Add results counter header -- see directory

Title: Search Results
Notes: Shows title, summary. Exposed filter for keyword. Sorted by relevance (desc), id (desc)

Title: Snapshots List
Notes: Lists most recent snapshot teasers with the matching placement, type or family. Max of three. Use a relationship to find the list widget term, then paragraphs using the list widget term. Add that relationship to a contextual filter for paragraph ID and hide the view when the filter is not available. You can use the Stories most recent 3 view display as an example of this. Add filters for: Published (true), content type (snapshot), placement tag (any term), type (any term), family (any term). Sort desc. Limit to three.

Title: Most Recent
Notes: Shows the most recently created snapshot as a teaser. Filter to only published snapshots. Contextual filter for placement tag from content URL (so that when this is on a department page only the most recent sapshot that matches the department placement tag is shown). Limit to one. Sort by created date desc.

Title: 2nd Recent
Notes: Shows the 2nd most recently created snapshot as a teaser. Filter to only published snapshots. Contextual filter for placement tag from content URL (so that when this is on a department page only the most recent sapshot that matches the department placement tag is shown). Limit to one and offset by one. Sort by created date desc.

Title: All Stories
Notes: Shows image, node title, date and summary. Exposed filter for keyword, category. Sorted by created (desc)

Title: Featured Stories
Notes: Limited to 3 promoted stories. Does not inherit filters or pager

Title: Stories List
Notes: Lists most recent stories with the matching placement tag.

Title: Most Recent by Tag
Notes: Shows the three most recently created stories. Filter for placement tag from the department/college/program etc by URL.

Title: Most Recent
Notes: Shows the most recently created story. Filter for placement tag. Get fields to display from content carousel in mockups

Title: 2nd Recent
Notes: Shows the 2nd most recently created story. Filter for placement tag from the page. Get fields to display from content carousel in mockups

Title: Most Recent 3
Notes: Already built and used in the stories & video widget. Should be updated to use teaser view mode and type filter.

Title: Most Recent 2
Notes: Already built and used in the stories & video widget. Should be updated to use teaser view mode and type filter.

Title: Related Stories
Notes: Added to story nodes. Shows next three most recent with same story type.

Title: Testimonial List
Notes: Most recent testimonial by placement tag, Render as teaser

Title: Testimonial Review
Notes: Admin reporting page used to review testimonials who's add date is X old.

Title: Most Recent
Notes: Shows the most recently created testimonial. Filter for placement tag. Get fields to display from content carousel in mockups

Title: 2nd Recent
Notes: Shows the 2nd most recently created testimonial. Filter for placement tag from the page. Get fields to display from content carousel in mockups

Title: All Recent Content
Notes: Shows 10 most recently created nodes in table view similar to the /admin/content view

Title: My Content
Notes: Shows 10 most recently created nodes by the user who's dashboard is being viewed in a table similar to the recently created block.

Title: Most Recent Three
Notes: Shows the three most recently created video card. Filters based on paragraph. Renders teaser.

Title: Most Recent
Notes: Shows the most recently created video card. Filter for placement tag. Get fields to display from content carousel in mockups

Title: 2nd Recent
Notes: Shows the 2nd most recently created video card. Filter for placement tag. Get fields to display from content carousel in mockups
